# The `WebAssemblyLowerRefTypesIntPtrConv.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Lowers IntToPtr and PtrToInt instructions on reference types to Trap instructions since they have been allowed to operate on non-integral pointers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Lowers IntToPtr and PtrToInt instructions on reference types to Trap instructions since they have been allowed to operate on non-integral pointers.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// erase each instruction replaced by trap</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
